planet.name: KIC 4862625 (AB) b
Planet Hunters 1 b
PH-1 b
planet.description: PH 1 b is a circumbinary planet. It is orbiting a double star (only one star is currently shown in the app, update to fix this is coming soon). There is a second pair of stars at approx. 1000 AU. Citizen scientists discovered this planet by looking at many light curves using the online tool at planethunters.org.
planet.imagedescription:
An artist's conception of the planet in a four-star system.
Credit: Image by Haven Giguere/Yale.
